svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 28, 2023" date: "2023-01-28"
* EF DevOps launch devnet with 605k validators to test BLS key changes
EF DevOps launch devnet with 605k validators to test BLS key changes
* Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.2 : new Capella test cases, polynomial commitment spec
Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.2 : new Capella test cases, polynomial commitment spec
* KZG Ceremony: 23,000+ contributions after two weeks Session sign-out issue fixed
Unique entropy generators: Proof-of-Cat & marble run Towers-of-pau implementation in
* Unique entropy generators: Proof-of-Cat & marble run
Unique entropy generators: Proof-of-Cat & marble run
* Towers-of-pau implementation in Go, survives suspending computer
Towers-of-pau implementation in Go, survives suspending computer
* EIP4844 decoupling gossip in Nimbus design notes
EIP4844 decoupling gossip in Nimbus design notes
* EOF v2 design , based on discussions of past month
EOF v2 design , based on discussions of past month
* Kaustinen PoS verkle testnet, replaces Condrieu testnet, includes proofs in blocks
Kaustinen PoS verkle testnet, replaces Condrieu testnet, includes proofs in blocks
* Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.1.1 : hotfix for client failing to start after enabling
database pruning Teku v23.1.0 : fixes, optimizations & new features; v23.1.1 : fixes
* Nimbus v23.1.1 : hotfix for client failing to start after enabling database pruning
Nimbus v23.1.1 : hotfix for client failing to start after enabling database pruning
* Teku v23.1.0 : fixes, optimizations & new features; v23.1.1 : fixes docker
Teku v23.1.0 : fixes, optimizations & new features; v23.1.1 : fixes docker permissions
* Execution layer: Nethermind v1.16.1 : reported ~0.5% improvement in staking rewards,
RAM consumption reduced and adds low disk space notification
* Nethermind v1.16.1 : reported ~0.5% improvement in staking rewards, RAM consumption
reduced and adds low disk space notification
* Patrick McCorry: rollup permissive vs permissioned licensing
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Optimism’s Retroactive Public Goods Funding
Optimism is running a second round of their Retroactive Public Goods Funding . Ten
million OP tokens will be given out in this RetroPGF round!
Project nominations close January 31st at 19:00 GMT.
Nominate projects for a specific category using the links below:
* Foundry: ChugSplash Foundry : deploy & manage upgradeable contracts, upgrade
OpenZeppelin Transparent proxies, supports mainnet & Optimism Deal cheat code mints
* ChugSplash Foundry : deploy & manage upgradeable contracts, upgrade OpenZeppelin
ChugSplash Foundry : deploy & manage upgradeable contracts, upgrade OpenZeppelin
* Deal cheat code mints ERC20 tokens in tests
Deal cheat code mints ERC20 tokens in tests
* OpenZeppelin proposal to mitigate ERC4626 inflation attacks with virtual assets &
OpenZeppelin proposal to mitigate ERC4626 inflation attacks with virtual assets &
* Sparse-arr-lib : Solidity library for sparse arrays, work in progress
Sparse-arr-lib : Solidity library for sparse arrays, work in progress
* Optimizing using Yul via example rock, paper & scissors contracts
Optimizing using Yul via example rock, paper & scissors contracts
* Samczsun’s signature database : exportable, add to canonical list via GitHub
Samczsun’s signature database : exportable, add to canonical list via GitHub
* Clipshot : ERC1155 token holder snapshots as CSV
Clipshot : ERC1155 token holder snapshots as CSV
* Hydralisk : Python CLI for bulk wallet creation
Hydralisk : Python CLI for bulk wallet creation
* Walk through of building bear traps for MEV bot front-runners
Walk through of building bear traps for MEV bot front-runners
* 1/3 of relayed blocks not censoring Tornado Cash transactions
1/3 of relayed blocks not censoring Tornado Cash transactions
* 0xPARC zk 4 week residency in Vietnam from mid-March
0xPARC zk 4 week residency in Vietnam from mid-March
* Cité Gestion (Swiss bank) tokenized its shares on Ethereum
Cité Gestion (Swiss bank) tokenized its shares on Ethereum
* RAI stablecoin: Ameen: reflections on ETH-only RAI & ungovernance Vitalik: how
RAI-like systems could support staked ETH
* Ameen: reflections on ETH-only RAI & ungovernance
Ameen: reflections on ETH-only RAI & ungovernance
* Vitalik: how RAI-like systems could support staked ETH
Vitalik: how RAI-like systems could support staked ETH
* Index Coop diversified staked ETH : index token of Rocket Pool, Lido & StakeWise
Index Coop diversified staked ETH : index token of Rocket Pool, Lido & StakeWise staked
* Maker voted to deploy 100M USDC from PSM into a Yearn vault
Maker voted to deploy 100M USDC from PSM into a Yearn vault
* Maple Finance adds receivables financing pool
Maple Finance adds receivables financing pool
* Migratooor : move tokens from one address to another
Migratooor : move tokens from one address to another
* MoonPlace : r/Place like NFTs on Arbitrum Nova using r/CryptoCurrency community
MoonPlace : r/Place like NFTs on Arbitrum Nova using r/CryptoCurrency community tokens
* Texture Punx : on-chain SVG NFTs with user selected traits, 50% of secondary sales
donated to Protocol Guild [Disclosure: Andrew minted three, one was free]
Texture Punx : on-chain SVG NFTs with user selected traits, 50% of secondary sales
* Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
* Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
* Ethereum Foundation are hiring a Community Lead for ethereum.org
Ethereum Foundation are hiring a Community Lead for ethereum.org
* Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
* US SEC Commissioner Peirce : approach crypto regulation carefully but don’t wait for
US SEC Commissioner Peirce : approach crypto regulation carefully but don’t wait for
* Reuters: US SEC probing investment advisers on custody of clients crypto
Reuters: US SEC probing investment advisers on custody of clients crypto
* FBI: Lazarus group behind $100M Horizon bridge theft in June 2022
FBI: Lazarus group behind $100M Horizon bridge theft in June 2022
* Outlier Ventures: which products need a token
Outlier Ventures: which products need a token
* Worldcoin releases hardware engineering files for Orb iris scanner
Worldcoin releases hardware engineering files for Orb iris scanner
* ZK MOOCs: modern zk cryptography and zk proofs
ZK MOOCs: modern zk cryptography and zk proofs
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* Jan 31 – deadline for Gitcoin grants round
Jan 31 – deadline for Gitcoin grants round
* Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
* Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
* Feb 27 – deadline for EF academic grants round
Feb 27 – deadline for EF academic grants round
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
